text: Close to Us () is a 1957 Soviet drama movie directed by Adolf Bergunker.РЯДОМ С НАМИ (1957)Биография Клары Лучко It stars Leonid Bykov, Innokenty Smoktunovsky, and Klara Luchko. == Actors == * Leonid Bykov as Nikolay * Innokenty Smoktunovsky as Andrey * Klara Luchko as Antonina * Georgi Yumatov as Yasha Mulovidov * Nikolai Rybnikov as Chumov * Nina Doroshina as Lyuba Zvonaryova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1957 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Close to Us
